name: User
responsibilities: Store information about a program user (type and name)

name: Invitation
responsibilities: Store information about an invitation (the admin who sent the invitation, the company who receives it, the offer it's suggested to make)
Store its current state (pending, accepted, or rejected).
Validate the invitation when the company orders to do so.

name: Offer
responsibilities: Stores information about an offer of materials (the material and amount, the price, and the location of the materials)

name: ConsoleInterface (a.k.a. IClient)
responsibilities: Communicate with the user via the usual input methods

name: ServerInterface (a.k.a. IMemory)
responsibilities: Communicate with the permanent memory of the program (which can be, among other things, a file or a database)
